Posts.Content: Jun 24, 2012 10:57PM Mjonesdj2 wrote: Get some nanosil spray and use it four times a day. It is better than anything else you can use. It is hard to find and a little expensive but worth it. Had 34 treatments and nener had any skin problems. As far as fatigue, rest when you need to. Let your body be the guide. You have my prayers.
